code: public void process(Exchange exchange) throws Exception {     // alter the body by setting it to a String type     exchange.getIn().setBody("Hello World"). }

public void configure() throws Exception {     from(getFtpUrl()).process(new Processor() {          public void process(Exchange exchange) throws Exception {             // alter the body by setting it to a String type             exchange.getIn().setBody("Hello World").         }     }).to("mock:result", "file://target/out"). }

protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          public void configure() throws Exception {             from(getFtpUrl()).process(new Processor() {                  public void process(Exchange exchange) throws Exception {                     // alter the body by setting it to a String type                     exchange.getIn().setBody("Hello World").                 }             }).to("mock:result", "file://target/out").         }     }. }
